SELECT * FROM(SELECT G.GALLERY_NO GALLERY_NO, G.USER_NO USER_NO, G.GALLERY_CONTENT GALLERY_CONTENT, G.PHOTO_PATH PHOTO_PATH, G.HASHTAG HASHTAG, G.GALLERY_READCOUNT GALLERY_READCOUNT ,G.GALLERY_DATE GALLERY_DATE, L.USER_NO LIKE_USER, L.GALLERY_NO LIKE_GALLERY FROM L_LIKE L LEFT JOIN L_GALLERY G ON L.GALLERY_NO = G.GALLERY_NO) WHERE LIKE_USER = #{ user_no }
select * from ( select rownum num, g.* from ( select * from (select * from l_gallery where user_no = #{user_no}) order by gallery_no desc) g) where num >= ${startRow} and num <= ${endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO L_BANNER VALUES(L_BN_S.NEXTVAL, #{ banner_title },#{ banner_content }, #{ photo_path },'L')
mapper.select: select * from (SELECT rownum num, l.* FROM(SELECT G.GALLERY_NO GALLERY_NO, G.USER_NO USER_NO, G.GALLERY_CONTENT GALLERY_CONTENT, G.PHOTO_PATH PHOTO_PATH ,G.HASHTAG HASHTAG, G.GALLERY_READCOUNT GALLERY_READCOUNT ,G.GALLERY_DATE GALLERY_DATE, U.USER_NAME USER_NAME, U.USER_BADGE FROM L_GALLERY G LEFT JOIN L_USER U ON U.USER_NO = G.USER_NO ORDER BY GALLERY_NO DESC) l) WHERE NUM >= 1 AND NUM <=3

SELECT C.*, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_BADGE FROM(SELECT G.* FROM L_GALLERY G LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT GALLERY_NO, COUNT(*) FROM L_LIKE GROUP BY GALLERY_NO)L ON G.GALLERY_NO = L.GALLERY_NO WHERE GALLERY_DATE > TO_DATE(SYSDATE-7))C LEFT JOIN L_USER U ON C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO
